029336aa-41c0-47ae-ba15-6edc3794420f.description: In selected locations of the world, registered centres provide exam preparation classes. However, IQN is NOT involved in the delivery or services provided by the registered centres. Any agreement is directly between the student and the respective centre.
029336aa-41c0-47ae-ba15-6edc3794420f.name: Registered Centre

badge_template_activities.title: In order to become IQN Registered Centre, your organisation must have qualified and experienced trainers to deliver exam preparation classes for the students. Your centre must have appropriate infrastructure to conduct our computer-based exams.
